cards.style: flat, 1px border, no shadow by default

inputs.style: h-9 rounded-md border border-input bg-transparent px-3 py-1 text-sm shadow-sm transition-colors file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-ring disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

visual_enhancers.gradients: None. Use solid colors and 1px borders.

dashboard.sidebar: Fixed width (240px), Dark theme (#18181b), vertically simplistic
dashboard.stats_row: Grid of 3-4 cards at top, simple metrics, big numbers
dashboard.newsletter_list: Table layout with status badges, date, actions

agent_card.default: Collapsed: Status Icon + Name + Duration + Status Badge
agent_card.expanded: Full width, monospace logs output, 'Trace Beam' border effect if running

new_newsletter.elements: Date Range Picker (Calendar), Reference Select, Custom Instructions (Textarea)

preview.layout: Split pane or Tabs (Preview / Raw HTML)
preview.code_pane: Syntax highlighted HTML (Prism or similar if available, else generic mono)

assets.logo: Text-based 'GTM Intel' in Manrope Bold, or simple geometric shape (Square with dot)
assets.images: None required. Use UI elements and typography.

universal_guidelines: Use 'Manrope' for all Headings. Use 'Inter' for body text.
Sidebar MUST be dark (#18181b). Main content MUST be light.
Status badges: Small, rounded-full, px-2.5 py-0.5, text-xs font-semibold. (e.g. bg-emerald-100 text-emerald-700)
Agent Output: MUST be in a scrollable box with 'font-mono text-xs' and 'bg-zinc-50' background.
Do not use gradients. Use borders and whitespace for separation.
Interactive elements must have hover states (e.g., table rows highlight on hover).
Date picker: Use shadcn Popover + Calendar.
All interactive elements MUST have data-testid attributes.

instructions_to_main_agent.step_1: Install additional dependencies: `yarn add @radix-ui/react-icons clsx tailwind-merge` (if not present).
instructions_to_main_agent.step_2: Configure Tailwind theme in `tailwind.config.js` to match the specific color palette (extend colors).
instructions_to_main_agent.step_3: Create the SidebarLayout component that wraps the main content.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_4: Build the 'AgentCard' component with the expandable state and status logic.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_5: Implement the Dashboard table with status badges.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_6: Create the Pipeline view with the vertical stepper visualization.
